backend/main.mo: Defines actor with comprehensive types for users, drivers, trips, payments, locations, and earnings, and initializes authorization and approval state with multiple mixins.
backend/migration.mo: Provides migration logic converting OldTrip records to NewTrip by defaulting null distance values to 0.0.
feature_evidence.json: Lists features, related files, components, test IDs, and metadata for recent product updates.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of various frontend files describing UI components, workflows, styling, and booking logic.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind base styles and OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting metadata, brand icons, and bootstrapping the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component handling authentication, role selection, profile setup, approval checks, and routing to dashboards.
frontend/src/components/ApprovalPendingS: Displays a pending-approval message with driver-specific requirements and instructions using translated text and user profile data.
frontend/src/components/BookingRequestFo: Provides a booking request form with location capture, driver selection, pricing logic, and checkout session creation.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders a site footer with a scroll-to-top video button and branding information.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Shows the main header with authentication handling, theme and language controls, and user role badges.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal for creating or updating customer or driver profiles, including photos, location capture, and approval requests.
frontend/src/components/RoleSelectionMod: Modal allowing users to choose between customer or driver roles before setup.
frontend/src/components/ServiceSelection: Form for selecting a service, driver, locations, payment type, and creating a trip with distance and deposit calculations.
frontend/src/components/StripeSetupCheck: Admin-only dialog prompting initial Stripe configuration with secret key and allowed countries.
frontend/src/components/TripDetailsDialo: Dialog showing trip details and allowing drivers to update status, submit messages, and finalize trip completion info.
frontend/src/components/VideoPlayer.tsx: Custom video player with play, mute, fullscreen controls, overlays, and optional autoplay-muted behavior.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, invalidating queries on identity change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider for handling Internet Identity authentication, login flow, identity persistence, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user, driver, trip, and earnings data via the actor API with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/i18n/i18n.ts: Handles language detection, storage, and translation resolution with fallback and interpolation.
frontend/src/i18n/I18nProvider.tsx: Implements an i18n context provider managing app language state and translation lookup.
frontend/src/i18n/translations.ts: Defines supported languages and the full translation dictionary for the UI.
frontend/src/i18n/useI18n.ts: Exports a hook that returns the i18n context utilities.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS base file defining light and dark theme variables and global styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboard.tsx: Admin interface showing approvals, company earnings, and wallet access with actions for managing user approval statuses.
frontend/src/pages/ClientDashboard.tsx: Client dashboard displaying trip stats, active and completed trips, and service booking UI.
frontend/src/pages/CompanyWallet.tsx: Shows company revenue metrics using earnings and trip data with cards for totals and loading indicators.
frontend/src/pages/DriverDashboard.tsx: Displays driver stats, trip summaries, and navigation to the wallet with trip detail functionality.
frontend/src/pages/DriverWallet.tsx: Calculates and displays driver earnings, deductions, and payout status using completed trip data.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Marketing landing page with hero content, login buttons, video section, and feature highlights.
frontend/src/utils/distance.ts: Provides Haversine distance calculation and formatted distance output.
frontend/src/utils/tripProgress.ts: Maps trip status and updates to progress steps, labels, and next driver actions.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL and hash parameters, persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them, supporting routing and token handling.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, container settings, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Describes project state, versioning, and a detailed list of existing features for an ICP-based service app.
